data.title: Delicious! Reasonable! Great service!
data.text: We had a three generation family reunion here and everyone enjoyed their food! The fajitas were delicious! And the margaritas great!

data.title: Good and authentic
data.text: Been going here for years. Ruben has it down as far as the authentic Mexican food. Fresh, good quality ingredients. Very welcoming family operated place.

data.title: My New Favorite
data.text: We went to Ruben's for the first time this week. Our past favorite Mexican restaurants have gone disappointing as of late. This place was so great. The service was immediate, happy and friendly. I ordered the three enchiladas plate. You know when they bother to make a different sauce for each protein that they care about flavor. And their salsa is THE BEST I've had in a Bakersfield restaurant. The ambience isn't great. But the food beats out Red Pepper, Rubios, Dom Pericos, Mexicali, Loma Linda etc...And the price is equal to or less than those I just listed.

data.title: Needs work
data.text:
Looking for a new local watering hole we chose to give Ruben's a try.... not bad but needs some work. The first visit was not bad but not great either. Second visit was a bit disappointing. Our group arrived it two waves...the first was seated and had drinks, the second was ignored. They were not busy so we shouldn't have had to make such an effort to get service.
After a couple drinks the inevitable restroom break was needed... UGH! Apparently cleanliness is not a priority, the floor looked as if it had not been mopped in several days. No towels in the dispenser and the sink is falling off the wall. 
Returning to the table I had questions about the appetizers that had been ordered in my absence... again, where the heck is the wait-staff? The food was gone before I got help.
Ordered from the menu and was not particularly impressed. It was good enough  and served hot, just not inspiring. 
Bottom line? The place has potential..the food is alright, the prices are fair and I would eat there again but the place needs a little work before I'd send friends...

data.title: Outstanding Lunch
data.text:
Ruben's is the type of restaurant that Tripadvisor was made for.  Just a little sit down restaurant in a strip mall in the northwest section of Bakersfield.  If you were driving by you would miss it.  I was here for lunch and it was excellent.  The chips appear to be home made.  The salsa is a great blend of flavors with just a little kick.

I had their lunch special pork burrito which was outstanding.  The staff was polite and quick.  I think I had my plate on the table in under 5 minutes.

The whole thing was less then $10 so I had no complaints.  I am sure that Bakersfield has a lot of great Mexican restaurant options, but I highly recommend Ruben's!

data.title: Great Authentic Mexican Food
data.text: We decided to visit Ruben's on a whim. We were started off with what appeared to be homemade tortilla chips and fresh salsa, both of which were excellent. I had a verde burrito and my friend had a beef chimichanga. We were both very impressed with the food and the service was also very good. The food was also very reasonably priced and portions were large

data.title: Great service and strong margaritas!
data.text: Love the fact that you are greeted with chips, salsa and bean dip!  The chile verde and arroz con pollo are a family favorite, as well as the fajitas!  Always a nice time out when we eat here.

data.title: Mexican seafood was great!
data.text: I don't know if this is the same Rubens I just went to on Calloway and Rosedale. If so great! The restaurant has an open air feel to it and they have an outside patio with a half dozen tables. I had the Caldo 7 Mare's ( 7 sea's soup) It was great (the best I've had here in Bakersfield) and they did not scrimp on the goodies. My wife had the deep fried white perch. She was also very pleased with her meal. We will definitely return

data.title: Best Mexican food in town.  Like my Nana's.
data.text: Ruben still makes his food like he did 10+ years ago but is now in Rosedale!  Best food and margaritas in town next to my Nana's! You won't be disappointed.  Rosedale and Calloway!

data.title: Super gegeten voor een super prijs!
data.text: Heerlijke gerechten voor een super prijs! Leuk restaurant met een super vriendelijke bediening. Aanrader! Alle gerechten die wij hebben gegeten waren top! Zelfs verse groenten 😜
